overview: Levente is a young nurse, he’s taking care of an old man, István who is terminally ill. He is doing a great job, but he’s taking distance from his  patient. István thinks that Levente is his son. It’s hard for Levente to connect with people, the only one exception is his sister, but even with her he has a difficult relationship. The film is following the way he is changing and  how he manages to deal with traumas.
title: The Beauty
